title: Trump doubles down on bashing Rob Reiner after film director's death
shortDescription: Trump expressed no regret nor offered an apology for comments about the late Rob Reiner, which even some Republican supporters have since denounced.

title: Trump to sue BBC for 'putting words in my mouth' in Jan. 6 video
shortDescription: The president says he will proceed with a lawsuit against the British broadcaster after the company published a video critics say was unfairly edited.

title: Trump calls Rob Reiner a 'deranged person'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump doubled down on his comments about Rob Reiner, calling the late director a "deranged person."

title: Trump moves to classify fentanyl as a 'weapon of mass destruction'
shortDescription: The executive order comes as the president has signed off on unprecedented airstrikes on alleged drug-carrying boats in the Caribbean.

title: 'Baby ... make the trees green.' Trump asks Melania after 2018 Christmas
shortDescription: President Trump and first lady Melania spoke at a Christmas reception on Dec. 14, 2025. Trump brought up past red Christmas trees, which went viral.

title: Conservatives condemn Trump's 'vile' Rob Reiner comments
shortDescription: "This is inappropriate and disrespectful discourse about a man who was just brutally murdered," GOP Rep. Thomas Massie said of Trump's comments.

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene blasts Trump post about Rob Reiner's death
shortDescription: 'This is a family tragedy, not about politics or political enemies,' Greene, a Republican and long-time Trump ally, wrote in a separate post on X.

title: Far-right candidate Jose Antonio Kast wins Chile's election
shortDescription: Chilean voters elected the most right-wing president in 35 years of democracy on Sunday, with official results showing arch-conservative Jose Antonio Kast with a thumping victory and his rival quickly conceding defeat.

title: Why did Trump say Rob Reiner has TDS? Reiner was a longtime Trump critic
shortDescription: Actor and director Rob Reiner was killed in LA on Dec. 14, 2025. He was a Democrat donor and critic of Donald Trump. POTUS said he died due to “TDS.”

title: Trump lashes out at Rob Reiner after death
shortDescription: "He was known to have driven people CRAZY by his raging obsession of President Donald J. Trump," the president said of Rob Reiner.

title: 'Things can happen.' Trump responds to deadly attack at Brown University
shortDescription: The attack at Brown, an Ivy League school in Rhode Island, on Dec. 13 left at least two dead and nine injured. 'Get well fast,' Trump said in a statement.

title: Why Trump and these MAGA allies are trying to resurrect the 'R-word'
shortDescription: Trump's foes and friends have noticed a revival of the term, which advocates say is harmful to Americans with mental disabilities.

title: Trump cuts include slashing access to disability lawyers, advocates say
shortDescription: The Trump administration proposed cuts for state-based legal services for disabled people, as rights advocates say DOJ pushed out many of its lawyers.

title: Trump pledges retaliation after 3 Americans killed
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said the U.S. will retaliate after 3 U.S. service personnel were killed in Syria.

title: GOP senator touts book promoting bleach treatment for autism, cancer
shortDescription: The Wisconsin lawmaker has been a supporter of Pierre Kory, a controversial physician who advocated for a "wonder drug" during the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: Trump says US will retaliate after soldiers, interpreter killed in Syria
shortDescription: Three others were wounded, Pentagon spokesman Sean Parnell said.

title: Maduro responds to Trump strike threats
shortDescription: Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro denounced Trump’s threats of land strikes after the U.S. seized an oil tanker near Venezuela.

title: Pinched by higher prices, many Trump voters say: Don't blame him
shortDescription: Affordability is front and center in voters’ minds as both parties gear up for next year’s congressional midterm elections.

title: Inside look at how ICE operates in Trump's America
shortDescription: Across the country, ICE officers accustomed to operating below the radar have been thrust into the spotlight by Trump's aggressive deportation orders.
